mapper.select: SELECT M_SEQ, M_NAME, M_ID, M_PW, M_EMAIL, M_ROLE, M_REGDATE, M_ENABLED FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID=#{m_id} AND M_PW=#{m_pw} AND M_ENABLED='Y'
SELECT M_SEQ, M_NAME, M_ID, M_EMAIL, M_REGDATE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_SEQ=#{m_seq}

mapper.update: UPDATE COCKTAIL SET LIKED=LIKED+1 WHERE COCK_SEQ=#{cock_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COCK_SEQ, COCK_NAME FROM (SELECT COCK_SEQ, COCK_NAME FROM COCKTAIL ORDER BY LIKED DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 11
